awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Multidimensional Inverse Quantum     Scattering
awd_abstract_narration: The principle investigator will study the inverse                          scattering problem by using two mathematical methods called                     the Wiener-Hopf factorization of operators and the generalized                  Muskhelishvili-Vekua method.  Besides being powerful tools to                   solve an important problem in physics, the methods of this                      proposal will also contribute to various pure and applied areas                 of mathematics such as operator theory, functional analysis,                    partial differential equations, integral equations, and complex                 analysis.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
